name: io.github.taylorleese/mcp-toolz
description: MCP server for Claude Code providing context management, todo persistence, and multi-AI perspectives. Share contexts and todos across sessions, compare insights from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and DeepSeek, and access everything via MCP tools.
title: MCP Toolz

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TOOLZ_DB_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to SQLite database for contexts and todos (defaults to ~/.mcp-toolz/contexts.db)

environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for ask_chatgpt tool functionality

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TOOLZ_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: OpenAI model to use for ChatGPT responses (defaults to gpt-5)

environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic API key for ask_claude tool functionality

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TOOLZ_CLAUDE_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: Anthropic model to use for Claude responses (defaults to claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929)

environmentVariables.name: GOOGLE_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google API key for ask_gemini tool functionality

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TOOLZ_GEMINI_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini model to use for Gemini responses (defaults to gemini-2.0-flash-thinking-exp-01-21)

environmentVariables.name: DEEPSEEK_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: DeepSeek API key for ask_deepseek tool functionality

environmentVariables.name: MCP_TOOLZ_DEEPSEEK_MODEL
environmentVariables.description: DeepSeek model to use for DeepSeek responses (defaults to deepseek-chat)
